What are Gems?

Gems are the official currency of the Linux Academy BETA platform. Community Edition members can use gems to unlock Challenges and Learning Activities. Paying members already get unlimited access, and will receive additional perks for your gems with future releases. You can earn more gems by completing these actions:
- Refer a friend
- Connect your LinkedIn account
- Complete Challenges and Learning Activities

Exam Breakdown

Demonstrate an understanding of the design principles and best practices of the Operation Excellence Pillar

1.

XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX

You've been asked to host a docker container within your AWS environment. What is the most appropriate product to use for this task?

  • XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX

    A. EC2

  • XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX

    B. Lambda

  • XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX

    C. ECS

    done Correct
  • XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX

    D. Opsworks

2.

XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX

You business has two EC2 instances, one is located in us-east, the other in us-west. You need to allow both machines to communicate with an application integration project you are consulting for. What solution would you recommend?

  • XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX

    A. Communication between VPCs in different regions is not possible with AWS.

  • XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX

    B. Ensure that each VPC has a IGW attached and each machine has a public IP address. Configure communications between those public IP addresses.

  • XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX

    C. Configure an inter-region VPC peer between the VPCs and allow communications using the private IP addresses of the instances.

    done Correct
    forum
    Why is this correct?
    XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX

    This is the recommended solution in this case.

  • XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX

    D. Configure a Hardware VPC VPN between the VPC in us-east-1 and the VPC in us-west-1. Configure the application to communicate using the private IP addresses of the instances.

    close Your Answer
    forum
    Why is this incorrect?
    XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX

    It's not possible to configure hardware VPC VPN between two VPCs. Use VPC peering instead.

3.

XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX

You are designing a VPC for a small application. It will operate in a private subnet and needs internet access to software updates and other communications with internet IPs. Your security team is happy that there are no restrictions in the application server's internet access. Which AWS products are needed to allow this solution. The priority is using the least amount of services. Assume the EC2 instance and any NACL's, routes, and Security groups are included implicitly.

  • XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX

    A. VPC, Subnets, Route Table(s), Nat Gateway, and Internet Gateway.

    done Correct
    forum
    Why is this correct?
    XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX

    Correct. These are the minimum required services to provide internet access to a private EC2 instance.

  • XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX

    B. VPC, Subnets, Route Tables, VPC Peering, and Virtual Private Gateway

  • XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX

    C. VPC, Subnets, Route Table(s), and NAT Gateway

  • XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX

    D. VPC, Subnets, Route Table(s), and Internet Gateway

    close Your Answer
    forum
    Why is this incorrect?
    XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX

    Incorrect. The scenario explains that the EC2 instance is in a private subnet. An internet gateway alone isn't enough to provide internet access.

4.

XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX

Your business generates a large amount of financial data within its SQL-backed financial application. You have been asked to suggest an AWS product which will allow storage of that data to be used for long term reporting, querying, forecasting, and business intelligence. Which AWS product should you suggest?

  • XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX

    A. Athena

  • XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX

    B. Glacier

  • XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX

    C. EMR

  • XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX

    D. Redshift

    done Correct

5.

XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX

You are consulting for a finance company that has specific backup and archiving policies. Financial documents for the past six months may need to be accessed frequently. You need to configure a setup that automatically sends any documents that are older than six months to a lower-cost, but highly durable, environment for archiving. Given that the company is using a Storage Gateway in File Gateway configuration, which of the following would be the best setup to reach the objectives?

  • XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX

    A. Enable versioning on the S3 connected bucket to the Gateway Storage configuration.

  • XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX

    B. Enable an S3 lifecycle policy to send all objects added to the bucket immediately to Glacier

  • XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX

    C. Enable an S3 lifecycle policy to integrate into Amazon EBS for a good backup solution.

  • XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX

    D. Enable S3 versioning with a lifecycle policy that sends objects older than six months to Amazon Glacier

    done Correct

6.

XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX

What steps are required to allow an EC2 instance to access the internet while being as secure as possible? Assume all security rules/ACL's and subnets are in place already. (Choose all that apply)

  • XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX

    A. Create a default route from the EC2 instance's subnet to the NAT Gateway.

    done Correct
    forum
    Why is this correct?
    XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX

    This directs traffic from the EC2 instance to the NAT gateway to be translated.

  • XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX

    B. Add a NAT gateway

    done Correct
    forum
    Why is this correct?
    XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX

    This is required to allow a private instance to have internet access.

  • XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX

    C. Attach an internet gateway to the VPC.

    done Correct
    forum
    Why is this correct?
    XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX

    This is required either to provide incoming and outgoing access to the instance, or to provide only outgoing access via a NAT gateway.

  • XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX

    D. Create a default route from the NAT gateway's subnet to the Internet Gateway.

    done Correct
    forum
    Why is this correct?
    XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX

    This is required in order to allow the NAT gateway to have internet access.

  • XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX

    E. Provide the instance with a Public or Elastic IP address.

  • XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX

    F. Create a default route from the EC2 instance's subnet to the internet gateway.

    close Your Answer
    forum
    Why is this incorrect?
    XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX

    This is only needed if incoming access is required.

7.

XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX

You business operates in a very security sensitive industry. You are looking at how to secure a small VPC. Your environment consists of a single S3 bucket, and an EC2 instance running in a internet connected VPC. What is the best way to lock down the environment, allowing access to S3 but keeping the environment as secure as possible?

  • XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX

    A. Create an S3 VPC endpoint. Apply a policy restricting access to the S3 bucket from the VPC endpoint.

  • XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX

    B. Provision a private VPC based S3 bucket. Migrate the contents of the public bucket and update the application. Remove the internet gateway to isolate the VPC.

  • XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX

    C. Create an S3 VPC endpoint. Apply a policy restricting access to the S3 bucket from the VPC endpoint, and remove the internet gateway.

    done Correct
    forum
    Why is this correct?
    XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX

    This is ideal. A VPC endpoint doesn't require an internet gateway. It allows access to S3 which is a public service from a VPC.

  • XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX

    D. Create a new security group, denying all IP's except the EC2 instance, and associate it with the S3 bucket.

    close Your Answer
    forum
    Why is this incorrect?
    XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX

    Security groups cannot DENY, and a security group cannot be associated with S3.

XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX

    A. Athena

  • XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX

    B. Redshift

    C. Elasticache

9.

XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX

You are designing a VPC to host a small application. The VPC will be connected back to your on-premises network using a VPN. An EC2 instance runs the application, and will only need to connect to the internet for software updates. You have a list of the software update DNS names. How can you restrict this within the AWS VPC?

  • XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX

    A. Place the EC2 instance in a public subnet and add an internet gateway.

  • XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX

    B. This restriction isn't possible using an AWS VPC.

  • XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX

    C. Add an internet gateway to the VPC, and a proxy service running on a EC2 instance in a public subnet with an elastic IP.

    done Correct
    forum
    Why is this correct?
    XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX

    A proxy, managed by you, would allow the flexibility needed. The proxy would gain internet access via the internet gateway, and could be used by your application to get its updates. It would not access anything else on the internet.

  • XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX

    D. Use the DNS filtering option on a NAT gateway to restrict internet access to just the software updates.

    close Your Answer
    forum
    Why is this incorrect?
    XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX

    This isn't a feature available using NAT gateways

10.

XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX

CloudTrail is enabled in us-east-1 and you have a number of trails created for different teams. You notice duplicate events for IAM. How can you resolve this issue?

  • XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX

    A. Disable logging global service events on all but one trail.

    done Correct
    forum
    Why is this correct?
    XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX

    Global service events are from global services such as IAM. Having this option enabled on more than one trail can cause duplicates. Disabling this option on all but one fixes this issue.

  • XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX

    B. Apply all Trails globally.

  • XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX

    C. Apply a cloudtrail folder using the CLoudTrail JSON editor.

  • XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX

    D. Use SQS + Lambda to remove duplicates.

    close Your Answer
    forum
    Why is this incorrect?
    XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX

    This is not a valid approach.

11.

XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX

You run a single instance application on an EC2 instance in AWS. Your architecture teams are looking to make changes and convert the application to operate on multiple servers. The app runs on Linux and currently accesses millions of flat file data files in the /data/... folder structure. This database is stored on an EBS volume attached to the EC2 instance. How can this be moved to work on multiple servers, with as little application changes as possible? What product would you suggest?

  • XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX

    A. EFS

    done Correct
    forum
    Why is this correct?
    XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX

    Correct. EFS is a network file system and could be utilised to provide access to the database files for all instances. It can also be mounted locally on Linux systems.

  • XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX

    B. Use EBS to mount the existing volume on all the new instances.

  • XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX

    C. S3

  • XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX

    D. EMR and HDFS

    close Your Answer
    forum
    Why is this incorrect?
    XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX

    Incorrect. This is an unsuitable product. HDFS is only used with EMR.

12.

XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX

A custom CloudWatch metric has determined that your web application is returning a high number of 404 errors. How could you automatically create a message in your online Help Desk system for your webmaster? (Choose all that apply)

  • XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX

    A. Set an alarm for the metric that sends a notification to an SNS topic.

    done Correct
    forum
    Why is this correct?
    XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX

    Create an alarm by setting a maximum number of errors per period.

  • XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX

    B. Create an SNS topic and subscribe the Create Ticket url for your Help Desk to the topic.

    done Correct
    forum
    Why is this correct?
    XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX

    You can subscribe HTTP and HTTPS endpoints to an SNS topic.

  • XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX

    C. Use the Zen Desk plugin for CloudWatch

  • XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX

    D. Run a report in AWS Config to find the source of the error, and send a message to an SNS topic.

  • XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX

    E. Run a scan with Amazon Inspector to locate the source of the error, and send a message to an SNS topic.

    close Your Answer
    forum
    Why is this incorrect?
    XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX

    Amazon Inspector reports on security best practices, it doesn't check for application errors.

13.

XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX

Which of the following AWS storage services are able to be natively mounted as mount points on a Linux system.

  • XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX

    A. EBS and Instance Store only

  • XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX

    B. Glacier, Instance Store, and EBS

  • XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX

    C. Instance Store, EBS, and EFS

    done Correct
    forum
    Why is this correct?
    XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX

    Instance Store, EBS and EFS are all capable of being mounted to EC2 instances. Using EFS (NFS) is not currently supported on windows instance.

  • XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX

    D. Instance Store, EBS, S3, Glacier, and EFS

    close Your Answer
    forum
    Why is this incorrect?
    XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX

    S3 and Glacier cannot be mounted as file systems.

Demonstrate understanding of the Design Principles and Best Practices of the Reliability pillar

1.

XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX

Which of the following services or service features are global features, that is, they operate globally and will continue working if a region fails?

  • XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX

    A. Route 53

    done Correct
    forum
    Why is this correct?
    XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX

    Route 53 is globally distributed, as is DNS. All elements of the service are globally resilient. Route 53 is used when you want to provide global HA in most cases.

  • XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX

    B. S3

  • XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX

    C. Elastic Load Balancer

  • XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX

    D. VPC

    close Your Answer
    forum
    Why is this incorrect?
    XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX

    VPC's operate within a region. If that region fails, the VPC fails.

2.

XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX

You need to design a VPC which is resilient to AZ failure from an internet access perspective. The VPC is in a four AZ region. How many Internet gateways are required to ensure multiple AZ failures won't disrupt internet connectivity.

  • XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX

    A. 1

    done Correct
    forum
    Why is this correct?
    XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX

    An IGW is resilient by design, and only one needs to be attached to a VPC in order to provide all subnets in all AZ's with resilient internet connectivity.

  • XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX

    B. 2

  • XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX

    C. 0

  • XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX

    D. 4

    close Your Answer
    forum
    Why is this incorrect?
    XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX

    Only one IGW can be attached to a VPC. Only one IGW is needed to provide resilience to all subnets in all AZs in a VPC.

3.

XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX

Your company has moved a legacy application from an on-premises data center to the cloud. The legacy application requires a static IP address hard-coded into the backend. What options do you have to maximize the availability of this application?

  • XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX

    A. Associate an Elastic IP address to an instance running the application, then enable EC2 Auto-recovery.

    done Correct
    forum
    Why is this correct?
    XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX

    An Elastic IP is a static public IP associated with your account. EC2 Auto-recovery will relaunch a failed instance and preserve the IP addresses.

  • XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX

    B. Associate an Elastic IP with a CloudFront distribution that uses an EC2 instance running your application as the origin for all requests.

  • XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX

    C. Create an AMI of the instance and launch it using Auto Scaling, which will deploy the instance again if it becomes unhealthy.

  • XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX

    D. Do not migrate the application to the cloud until it can be converted to work with the ELB and Auto Scaling.

  • XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX

    E. Associate an Elastic IP with a Network Load Balancer and target multiple instances in the AZ running the application.

    done Correct

4.

XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX

Which of the following services/service features is natively highly available in a region, and can cope with a AZ failure without itself failing?

  • XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX

    A. VPC Subnet

  • XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX

    B. EC2

  • XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX

    C. DynamoDB

    done Correct
    forum
    Why is this correct?
    XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX

    DynamoDB is resilient to AZ failure by design.

  • XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX

    D. S3

    done Correct

5.

XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX

Which EC2 features can help mask the failure of an instance? (Choose all that apply)

  • XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX

    A. AWS CloudFail

  • XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX

    B. EC2 Autorecovery

    done Correct
    forum
    Why is this correct?
    XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX

    On supported instance types, EC2 Autorecovery will replace an instance with an identical one, preserving IP addresses.

  • XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX

    C. AWS Glue

  • XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX

    D. NAT Gateway

  • XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX

    E. Elastic IP

    done Correct

6.

XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX

You are designing an application with three components: an app server running on EC2, a media store running on S3, and a database running on DynamoDB. You have been asked to make sure your design allows a single AZ to fail without impacting service. Which option is correct?

  • XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX

    A. No specific changes are required. EC2, S3, and DynamoDB are all region resilient and will operate fine if an AZ fails.

  • XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX

    B. Edit the configuration of the EC2 instance, enable the AZ roaming option, and pick all the availability zones.

  • XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX

    C. S3 and DynamoDB are resilient to an AZ failure by design. Provision EC2 using a Launch Configuration and an Auto Scaling group to ensure it can cope with an AZ failure and auto-heal if needed.

    done Correct
    forum
    Why is this correct?
    XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX

    EC2 is the only component which needs to have resilience added. LC and ASG are the products which achieve this.

  • XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX

    D. Leave EC2 set up using defaults, enable AZ replication on S3, and set up master/slave replication on DynamoDB.

    close Your Answer
    forum
    Why is this incorrect?
    XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX

    EC2 is not resilient by default. There are no such options for S3 and DynamoDB.

7.

XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX

You have been asked to provide a recommendation on the most resilient database solution available within AWS. The business requirements are that the data is structured. They require multiple availability zones and very low latency between mirrors. Right now, two availability zones are required, but whatever solution is selected needs to be able to cope with three or more. Which product would you recommend?

  • XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX

    A. Athena

  • XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX

    B. DynamoDB

  • XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX

    C. Aurora

    done Correct
    forum
    Why is this correct?
    XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX

    Aurora supports more than two AZ replicas and uses a shared storage platform. It's the most suitable candidate.

  • XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX

    D. RDS

    close Your Answer
    forum
    Why is this incorrect?
    XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX

    Except for Aurora, DB engines can run in a maximum of two availability zones. Additionally they don't utilise shared storage, and so they suffer from the latency associated with replication.

XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX

  • XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX

    done Correct
    forum
    Why is this correct?
    XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX

  • XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX

    close Your Answer
    forum
    Why is this incorrect?
    XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX

    While stopping and starting does reboot the operating system, this is not the reason it tends to clear System Status Check errors.

XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX

    forum
    Why is this correct?
    XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX

    XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX

2.

XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX

You are a consultant and have been asked to perform an audit of the AWS environment for a medical company concerned about security compliance. The company administrator provides you with the root login to the AWS account. After beginning the audit, you discover that the Nurses that work for the company are all using a shared single login account called nurse_user1 to upload and download daily shift change reports from S3. After further investigation, you discover that the nurse_user1 account has full administrator privileges to EC2 and S3. When you document your findings, what security issues would you note in the report and what suggestion would you make to resolve the problem? Choose 2.

  • XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX

    A. There are three security issues: 1. You were given access to the root account. 2. The nurses are sharing an account and 3. The nurses have full administrator privileges to EC2 and S3.

    done Correct
    forum
    Why is this correct?
    XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX

    This answer is correct. AWS recommends granting access based on the principle of least privilege so there are three security issues. 1. As a consultant, you were given access to the root account. 2. The nurses have full access to all EC2 and S3 services. 3. The nurses are sharing one IAM account.

  • XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX

    B. To resolve the security issues you would recommend the following: 1. Create individual accounts for the nurses and put all of the nurse accounts into a group. 2. Grant read/write permissions for the newly created group to the appropriate S3 bucket.

  • XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX

    C. To resolve the security issues you would recommend the following: 1. Create individual accounts for the nurses and put all of the nurse accounts into a group. 2. Grant read/write permissions for the newly created group to the appropriate S3 bucket. 3. Recommend as a best practice that temporary accounts be created for consultants.

    done Correct
    forum
    Why is this correct?
    XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX

    The principle of least privilege recommends that the minimal access required to complete the task be provided. Therefore, to resolve the issue, you would recommend that the company no longer allow shared accounts, especially the root account. Groups should be used to simplify management for multiple accounts, and a temporary account should be created for consultants using Security Token Service so that the account will expire when the access is no longer required.

  • XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX

    D. There are two security issues: 1. The nurses are sharing an account. 2. The nurses have full administrator privileges to EC2 and S3.

    close Your Answer
    forum
    Why is this incorrect?
    XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX

    This answer is partially correct, there are three issues with the configuration, not two.

  • XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX

    E. There is only one security issue: The nurses should not have full privileges to all EC2 instances and S3.

XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX

You are an EC2 administrator and you create an EC2 instance and attach an EBS volume. Two weeks later, your supervisor informs you that the data on the EBS volume must be encrypted. What must you do to encrypt the existing EBS volume?

  • XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX

  • XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX

    B. It is not possible to encrypt an existing EBS volume. You can take a snapshot of the unencrypted volume.     done Correct
    forum
    Why is this correct?
    XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX

    This answer is correct. For more information about encrypting a snapshot during a copy visit the AWS documentation at this link: https://docs.aws.amazon.com/AWSEC2/latest/UserGuide/ebs-copy-snapshot.html

  • XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX

    C. In the EC2 Dashboard, select the EBS volume, and under Actions select the encrypt volume option.

  • XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX

    D. It is not possible to encrypt an existing EBS volume. You must delete the existing volume and all existing data will be lost. You will have to recreate the data on the new encrypted volume.

    close Your Answer
    forum
    Why is this incorrect?
    XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX

    Although you cannot directly encrypt an existing volume, there is a better alternative than deleting the existing volume and recreating the data.

    XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX

    S3 is a very economical storage system and benefits from free transfer from IT, to CloudFront (known as origin fetch). This is the best option for cost and for user experience - even accounting for NOT using existing infrastructure. Note given the data volume - transfer costs are likely to be MUCH more important.

  • XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX

    B. Migrate the media to an EC2 instance, store the media on an attached PIOPS EBS volume and configure CloudFront to use that server as an origin.

  • XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX

    C. Use internal servers within your datacenter and serve the content from a single location

  • XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX

    D. Store the media on an on-premises web server and configure CloudFront to use that server as an origin.

    Why is this incorrect?
    XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX

    This might save 'some' costs in terms of using an existing server but you will pay origin fetch costs to Cloud Front which could be substantial.
